original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2376)@</color>  引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形雲氣盾，在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1506)@</color>秒內減少30%<color=#80cc00>物理傷害</color>。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2376)@</color> Bleeding air condensing shield, forming a spherical cloud air shield around the generals, in the next <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1506)@</color> Reduce 30% <color=#80cc00>physical damage</color> in seconds.
